title: Feature Request: Order Port Scan table by column and allow import several protocols
author: egpgit
body_snippet:
Hi, thaks for this awssome program. 

Now the Port Scan Tool result in a table that can't be ordered, so if you want import several hosts, you need to find it in the table. Order by column helps that action.

When you want import a host wich has two possible connections, you need do it for each one. For example, I have a host with ssh and https services, I'd like to import both services in a one step.

It will be great that the Host/IP column doesn't hide the ip when resolve dns name.
